txt.en: 'I do not know if victory is possible, but I will meet the challenge standing upright, with Cúmaeth bent, his string taut. We cross the River and bring the fight to the very lawns of the Enemy. While the Golden Host launches its attack, the Hidden Guard will deliver their charge to the gates of the fortress, and demand satisfaction.\n\n'If fortune is on our side, one of our aims, at least, will end in victory. We will be better for the trying, even should we fail.'
What do you think of this mission?
